Without CAMERA permission, the app cann\'t turn on flashlight and the app will use screen light instead of flash. \n\nAre you sure you want to deny this permission?

Without STORAGE permission, the app cannot capture image and save on local storage.
 

Are you sure you want to deny this permission?

Without CAMERA permission, The app cannot use camera hardware to show or zoom anything.
 

Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
LED flash are using by other app, the app will use screen light instead.
If you enjoy using LED Flashlight app. Would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support
We\'re so happy to hear that you love Flashlight! It\'d be really helpful if you rated us in the Google Play Store. Thanks so much for spending some time with us.
Suggest us what went wrong and we\'ll work on it!
When you lock the app, you cannot use other buttons to controller such as: turn on/turn off flashlight, setting app…
